akas: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding USA
akas from release info: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding USA

1.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Valentine

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

1.plot: Explore courtship in the Traveller community follows Ina and Danielle as they prepare to marry their first loves.

2.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Fortune

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

2.plot: Explore Traveller customs, attitudes to money and how they afford their extraordinary weddings.

3.title: Best Dressed Brides

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

3.plot: Famed dressmaker Thelma Madine reveals her most memorable dresses and what it took to create them.

4.title: Life on the Run

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

4.plot: Explore how the traveling community stays mobile with 'land grabs' at night, battles with local residents, and the joys of being free spirits.

5.title: The Luck of the Irish

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

5.plot: Meet Irish Travellers on both in Ireland and in England, with weddings, christenings and St Patrick's Day.

6.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Ladies' Day

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

6.plot: Explore the unique connection between the Travellers and horses, from Ladies' Day at the races to road races at night.

7.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Christening

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

7.plot: The Traveller and Gypsy communities' unique approach to birth and death, revealing a world with its own strict rules of conduct.

8.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Christmas: Tinsel and Tiaras

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

8.plot: This festive special, packed with weddings, fun and festive spirit, shows that nobody does Christmas bling like Gypsies and Travellers.

9.title: Big Fat Gypsy Christmas: Carols and Caravans

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

9.plot: Follows travellers soaking up the sun in Tenerife, a festive 18th birthday and a spectacular winter wedding.

10.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Holiday

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

10.plot: Follow the gypsies and Irish Travellers as they prepare for the most amazing trip of their lives.

11.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Grand National

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

11.plot: Follow Gypsies and Travellers as they descend on the biggest non-gypsy event in the UK horse-racing calendar.

1.title: Born to Be Wed

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

1.plot: The first episode in the series looks at the milestones in a traveller girl's life en route to the biggest day of her life - her wedding day.

2.title: No Place Like Home

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

2.plot: This episode explores how the travelling community are fighting to preserve their ancient culture and customs and the obstacles they face keeping their traditional way of life alive.

3.title: Desperate Housewives

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

3.plot: The third of five episodes in the My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding series explores the clear and defined roles of young men and women in the gypsy and traveller community, and reveals attitudes toward education, marriage and domestic violence.

4.title: Boys Will Be Boys

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

4.plot: Whilst gypsy and traveller women all want to be a princess on their wedding day, the reality in the gypsy community is that on every other day it is man who is King.

5.title: Bride & Prejudice

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

5.plot: The final episode of season one uncovers the prejudice that exists against the travelling community in Britain today.

6.title: My Big Fat Royal Gypsy Wedding

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

6.plot: A one-off special, "My Bigger Fatter Gypsy Wedding" features the biggest Traveller wedding of the year with dressmaker Thelma Madine as event planner.

7.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Christmas

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

7.plot: The celebrations and traditions of members of the Irish Traveller community at Christmas, as well as two further weddings.

1.title: Diamantes Are Forever

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

1.plot: This episode explores the competitive streak that lies behind the now famous gypsy look and the extraordinary sacrifices that are taken to achieve it.

2.title: I Fought the Law

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

2.plot: In this episode, Irish Traveller Danielle is determined to live her life in a traditional way and, at just 15, is planning a lavish black pink and bling hen party.

3.title: School of Hard Knocks

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

3.plot: As the eldest granddaughter of a family with both Romany gypsy and Irish traveller heritage, 15 year old Santana is expected to follow strict rules for girls and set a good example for her younger family members.

4.title: Love Conquers All

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

4.plot: This episode explores further the cultural divide between gypsies and non-gypsies and looks at what happens when the two worlds are thrust together in marriage.

5.title: Reputation Is Everything

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

5.plot: For Gypsies and Travellers, a clean family name is crucial, and the consequences of losing it are devastating. After causing a scandal by spending time alone with her boyfriend, Rosanne is rushed up the aisle to save her reputation.

6.title: Out of Site, Out of Mind

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

6.plot: In this episode we witness a community at a cross roads, as the battle to preserve the gypsy and traveller way of life intensifies. Will the future tear their culture apart, or do they have a place together in the modern world?

7.title: We Are Family

episode of.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding (TV Series 2011–2015)

7.plot: For generations, traveller celebrations have been a family affair. In this episode we meet the Mcfadyens, a large Irish traveller family in the midst of a series of celebrations.

imdb.title: My Big Fat Gypsy Wedding
plot: Explores the lives and traditions of several Irish Traveller families as they prepare to unite their families in marriage.
